name: Sally's Studio
storyline: Join Sally as she travels the world helping people feel their best. Warm up on the beach, find balance at a mountaintop retreat, unwind in a peaceful courtyard and lots more. Warm-ups, yoga poses, toning, and even dance steps are some of the unique services you will offer as your studio expands. Keep your customers happy and you'll earn extra hearts and bigger tips to help grow your very own studio.
summary: Sally's Studio is the third in a series of games featuring Sally, the now famous owner of a salon and a spa franchise.
